title: T206 Various and HOF For Sale
author: Jaybird

posts.post_title: T206 Various and HOF For Sale
posts.post_content:
I've got a few cards I'm trying to thin out and will probably put on ebay but wanted to see if anyone here wanted them first.

[url]http://s1023.photobucket.com/albums/af353/jasonleemiller/T206%20For%20Sale/[/url]

See the cards in the photobucket link above.  Please PM me because the email link doesn't always seem to work.


McGraw - Sovereign - $40
Chance (red) - SC - $70
Jordan (batting) Pied - $45
Isbell - Pied - $20
Carr - SC - $45
Bergen - Pied - $35
E95 Devlin - $25

Alperman - SGC 50 - SOLD
Dunn - Pied PSA 3.5 - SOLD
Wilson - Old Mill - on ebay
Schmidt - SC - on ebay
Rucker - SC - SOLD
Powell - Horizontal - on ebay
Miller - Pied - on ebay
McIntyre - Pied PSA 3.5 - on ebay

Check or money order is fine with me as well as no fee paypal.  

Thanks,

Jason

PM sent re individual cards.
Thanks,
--S

I've gotten a few offers for individual cards so I figure I'll put some prices up for them.  If someone wants to make me an offer for all of them, feel free.  Otherwise, I will sell them individually.  All prices are shipped w/ delivery confirmation.

Thanks for looking.  LEt me know if you have questions.

posts.post_title: Update sold and some not available (on ebay)
posts.post_content:
some sold and some not available (on ebay).

Thanks,

Jason
